revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Mercku |model=M2A |revision=(Wi-Fi Router) |series=AC1200 |asin=B07HQDZ9Z6 |price=119 |fcc_date=06/29/2018 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |type=wireless system, mesh node |fcc_id=2APR4-M2, 2AQOI-M2A |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8197FS |cpu1_cspeed=1 GHz |fla1=128 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Realtek |ram1_model=RTL8197FS |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8197FS |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi2_chip1_model=RTL8812BR;RTL8812BRH, I3X15P1 GI12; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Realtek |sw_model=RTL8367RB |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports=1 |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac }}
:• '''867''' Mbps - 2SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''300''' Mbps - 2SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan.) = '''''1200 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|M2 Standalone Wi-Fi Router}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.mercku.tech/}} "R05-REV2" and "2018-02-09" are silkscreened onthe board in the FCC photos. {{See also|Mercku M2A Node}} Initially the M2A model was covered by the same FCC ID but a Change :in Identification request on 8/16/2018 separated the M2A into its :own FCC ID (2AQOI-M2A) despite being electrically identical. ===Models=== :[https://www.mercku.tech/products/ Mercku M2 Products] *''M2 Bee Node'' • [[Mercku M2A Node]] *''M2 Standalone Wi-Fi Router'' • [[Mercku M2]] *''M2 Swarm System'' (3x M2 Standalone Wi-Fi Router) *''M2 Hive System'' (1x M2 Wi-Fi Router + 4x M2 Bee Node) ===Links=== * [https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/m2-hive-world-s-most-powerful-mesh-wi-fi-router-family-design ''M2 Hive: world's most powerful MESH Wi-Fi router'' on '''Indiegogo'''] :Used with [[Mercku M2A Node]] devices to build a "M2 Hive." __NOTOC__
